attributes.title: Message to NRIs from Paramahamsa Nithyananda – on Decision Fatigue, Integrity
attributes.description:
Wake UP call to all NRIs (non-residential Indians) – Decision Fatigue is the cause of your demise! Paramahamsa Nithyananda urges NRIs to look into why you are 600 
times more likely to die from heart failure and prone to other disease, especially statistically at such a young age. If 99% of you are in white-collar jobs, how is this happening? 
The answer is decision fatigue!
 
Decision Fatigue is one of the false beliefs fed into you to make you feel false self-worth and constantly engage you, entertain you within the Matrix. Paramahamsa Nithyananda 
explains another danger of decision fatigue – just as you are trying to raise yourself off of the ground, out of delusion, decision fatigue is the blow that sends you back into the 
slumber of the Matrix.
  
Understand Decision Fatigue:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z4f9u8ACX-E
Sadashivoham – Come out of Maya Matrix permanently:
bit.ly/sadashivoham2016
